channel.title: BUpolitics
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUpolitics, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Putin reveals what he told Trump when they shook hands on tarmac in Alaska
item.description: President Trump and Russian President Vladimir Putin emerged from a three-hour meeting with Mr. Putin praising the get-together as "neighborly."

item.title: 'We didn't get there': Trump says more work to do for Ukraine peace deal after summit with Putin
item.description: President Trump emerged from a three-hour summit with Russian President Vladimir Putin saying they were unable to reach a deal to end the war in Ukrai...

item.title: Trump admin agrees to keep D.C. police chief in place, but with immigration enforcement order
item.description: The Trump administration on Friday reversed course and agreed to leave the Washington, D.C., police chief in control of the department after a court h...

item.title: Photos of border patrol arresting a woman selling food and workers at an LA car wash
item.description: U.S. border patrol agents made more arrests in Los Angeles and the surrounding area, arresting a woman selling food outside a Home Depot in Los Angele...

item.title: Northern Virginia schools defy Trump administration on transgender bathroom access
item.description: Five Northern Virginia school districts plan to keep allowing students to use restrooms and locker rooms based on their gender identity, despite an ul...

item.description: Rep. Delia Ramirez recently asserted that “I’m a proud Guatemalan before I’m an American” while bashing America at the left-wing Panamerican Congress ...

item.title: Former Trump statistics chief slams Friday firing of Erika McEntarfer
item.description: Bill Beach said the president's suggestions that the jobs report was rigged betrayed a misunderstanding in how those numbers are assembled.

item.title: Trump fires statistics chief after soft jobs report
item.description: The monthly jobs report showed just 73,000 jobs in July, with big reductions to May's and June's numbers

item.title: DHS Launches $600 Million Grant Program for State Detention Centers

item.title: Louisville Revises Sanctuary Policies: Early Indicator of Growing Trend?

item.title: Tech, Media & Telecom Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: DeepSeek, SoFi and more in the latest Market Talks covering Technology, Media and Telecom.

item.title: Reid Hoffman Raises $24.6 Million for AI Cancer-Research Startup
item.description: The LinkedIn co-founder is starting Manas AI with “The Emperor of All Maladies” author Siddhartha Mukherjee.

item.title: What to Know About China's DeepSeek AI
item.description: The Chinese upstart says it has trained high-performing AI models cheaply, without using the most advanced chips.

item.title: Silicon Valley Is Raving About a Made-in-China AI Model
item.description: DeepSeek is called “amazing and impressive” despite working with less-advanced chips.

item.title: Can an App Replace a Personal Trainer? I Tested Nearly a Dozen to Find Out
item.description: Apps can add flexibility and freshness to your routine. Just try not to get injured.
